event.title: Microsoft Events Catalog
event.description: A fully-searchable catalog of events conducted by Microsoft and their partners.

event.title: Microsoft Build
event.description: Explore what’s next in tech and the future of hybrid work. Join us May 25–27, 2021 at Microsoft Build.

event.title: Microsoft Ignite
event.description: Until our next event experience, check out the latest learning opportunities, recent event highlights, and more.

event.title: Dev Intersection
event.description: THE INTERSECTION OF CO-LOCATED TECHNOLOGY EVENTS: Microsoft SQL Server Azure SQL Conference and Azure + AI Conference

event.title: Data Toboggan
event.description: A free, virtual conference focused on Azure Synapse and related services including Synapse Analytics including Machine Learning, Apache Spark, Serverless Pools, and Pipelines.

event.title: DATA SATURDAY 12 - DATA ANZ
event.description: Data ANZ 2021 (Australia- New Zealand) is a free one-day online event offering content across Data Management and Administration, Cloud and Hybrid Architecture, Analytics, Business Intelligence, Artifical Intelligence, DevOps, Application Development and more.
